lyric.verse: Smooth Smooth The way went beyond Gentle Gentle Seasons went by Inviting the mountain scream Butterfly cried
lyric.chorus: I found myself searching for you alone The fever that flows up from my body Goes round and round but going nowhere Wondering with a blindfold
lyric.verse: Crazy Crazy Swallowed undulation Cruel Cruel The way ended I counted the days Whenever my braids waved
lyric.chorus: The sky which had its one hand plucked Leaves its wound open The sound of the insects Breathed out beside my heel Blurred star without any sound
